[Rowan]256-rowan

The last time [I]199-grandpa attended a funeral , [I]199-grandpa ended up with a broken arm . The story made headlines after [I]199-grandpa threw [myself]199-grandpa into [[my]199-grandpa mother]197-my mother ’s open grave . It ’s been over two decades since that day , and while [I]199-grandpa ’ve completely changed as [a person]198-a person , [my]199-grandpa aversion to mourning has n’t . But due to [my]199-grandpa responsibilities as [[my]199-grandpa late grandfather ’s youngest relative]199-grandpa , [I]199-grandpa ’m expected to stand tall and unbothered during [his]199-grandpa wake . It ’s nearly impossible , with [my]199-grandpa skin itching like [I]199-grandpa ’m wearing a cheap polyester suit .

[My]199-grandpa patience wanes as the hours go on , with [hundreds of [Kane employees]201-kane employees]200-hundreds of kane employees and [business partners]202-business partners offering [their]200-hundreds of kane employees condolences . If there ’s anything [I]199-grandpa hate more than funerals , it ’s talking to [people]203-people . There are only [a few individuals [I]199-grandpa tolerate]204-a few individuals i tolerate , and [[my]199-grandpa grandfather]199-grandpa was [one of [them]204-a few individuals i tolerate]199-grandpa .

And now [he]199-grandpa ’s gone .

The burning sensation in [my]199-grandpa chest intensifies . [I]199-grandpa do n’t know why it bothers [me]199-grandpa as much as it does . [I]199-grandpa ’ve had time to prepare while [he]199-grandpa was in a coma yet the strange sensation above [my]199-grandpa rib cage returns with a vengeance whenever [I]199-grandpa think of [him]199-grandpa .

[I]199-grandpa run a hand through [my]199-grandpa dark hair to give [myself]199-grandpa something to do .

“ [I]205-a nameless attendee ’m sorry for [your]205-a nameless attendee loss , [son]199-grandpa . ”[205-a nameless attendee] [A nameless attendee]205-a nameless attendee interrupts [my]199-grandpa thoughts .

“ [Son]45-son ? ”[199-grandpa] The one word leaves [my]199-grandpa mouth with enough venom to make [the man]199-grandpa wince .

[The gentleman]199-grandpa centers [his]199-grandpa tie across [his]199-grandpa chest with fumbling hands . “ I’m — well — uh . ”[199-grandpa]

“ Excuse [[my]46-cal brother]206-my brother . “ [I]199-grandpa do n’t need an excuse for [my]199-grandpa behavior . ”[199-grandpa]

“ Fuck . ”[199-grandpa] There ’s a reason [I]199-grandpa prefer solitude . Small talk requires far too much effort and diplomacy for [my]199-grandpa taste .

“ This is [me]199-grandpa trying . ”[199-grandpa] [My]199-grandpa left eye twitches as [I]199-grandpa press [my]199-grandpa lips together .

“ Well , do better . For [him]46-cal . ”[46-cal] [Cal]46-cal tilts [his]46-cal head toward the picture above the fireplace .

[I]199-grandpa let out a shaky breath . The photograph was taken during a family trip to [Dreamland]2-dreamland when [[my]199-grandpa brothers]210-my brothers and [I]199-grandpa were [kids]211-kids . [Grandpa]199-grandpa smiles into the lens despite [my]199-grandpa tiny arms wrapped around [his]199-grandpa neck in a chokehold . Residual allergies from spring in [the city]213-new york city . That ’s all .

“ And even less for [the wealthy]2054-the wealthy . ”[572-declan] [Declan]572-declan stops by [my]199-grandpa other side . [An unknown couple]226-an unknown couple walks up to [the three of [us]223-us]227-the three of us . This one ’s for [you]230-your , [Grandpa]199-grandpa .

[I]199-grandpa stare down at the white envelope . [My]199-grandpa name is written across the front in [[my]199-grandpa grandpa]199-grandpa ’s elegant cursive . [I]199-grandpa flip it over , finding it untampered with [his]229-her counterpart signature [Dreamland]296-rowan ’s Princess [Cara]51-princess cara ’s Castle wax seal .

[The lawyer]231-the lawyer finishes passing out the other letters to [[my]199-grandpa two brothers]232-my two brothers . “ [You]230-your ’re required to read [his]199-grandpa individual letters prior to [me]231-the lawyer reviewing [Mr. Kane]199-grandpa ’s final will and testament . ”[231-the lawyer]

[My]199-grandpa throat tightens as [I]199-grandpa break the seal and pull out [my]199-grandpa letter . It ’s dated exactly a week before [Grandpa]199-grandpa ’s accident three years ago that led to [his]199-grandpa coma .

To [[my]199-grandpa sweet little [Rowan]296-rowan]233-my sweet little rowan ,

[I]199-grandpa choke back on a laugh . Sweet and little are the last words [I]199-grandpa ’d use to describe [myself]199-grandpa since [I]199-grandpa ’m as tall as [an NBA player with the emotional range of a rock]234-an nba player with the emotional range of a rock , but [Grandpa]199-grandpa was blissfully ignorant . Although [you]235-you ’re [a man]236-a man now , [you]235-you ’ll always be [the same little lad in [my]199-grandpa eyes]237-the same little lad in my eyes . [I]199-grandpa still remember the day [[your]235-you mother]238-your mother gave birth to [you]235-you like it was yesterday . [You]235-you were [the largest of the three , with these fat cheeks and a head full of dark hair]239-the largest of the three , with these fat cheeks and a head full of dark hair that [I]199-grandpa was sadly jealous of . [You]235-you sure had a pair of lungs in [you]235-you and [you]235-you would n’t stop crying until [they]240-they handed [you]235-you over to [[your]235-you mom]238-your mother . It was like everything was right in [the world]241-the world when [you]235-you were in [her]238-your mother arms .

[I]199-grandpa reread the paragraph twice . It ’s strange to hear [[my]199-grandpa grandpa]47-my grandpa talk about [[my]199-grandpa mother]238-your mother so casually . The subject became taboo in [[my]199-grandpa family]243-my family until [I]199-grandpa could barely remember [her]238-your mother face or [her]238-your mother voice anymore .

[I]199-grandpa know [I]199-grandpa ’ve been busy with work and that [I]199-grandpa did n’t spend as much time as [I]199-grandpa should ’ve with [you]235-you all . It was easy to blame [the company]244-the company for the physical and emotional distance in [my]199-grandpa relationships . When [[your]235-you mother]238-your mother died , [I]199-grandpa was n’t sure what to do or how to help . With [[your]235-you father]212-dad pushing [me]199-grandpa away , [I]199-grandpa devoted [myself]199-grandpa to [my]199-grandpa job until [I]199-grandpa became numb to everything else . It worked when [[my]199-grandpa wife]238-your mother died and it worked when [[your]235-you mother]238-your mother met a similar passing , but [I]199-grandpa realize that it set [[your]235-you father]212-dad up for failure . And in doing that , [I]199-grandpa failed [you]235-you all as well . Instead of teaching [Seth]53-seth kane how to live a life after great loss , [I]199-grandpa showed [him]53-seth kane how to hold on to despair , and it only hurt [you]235-you and [[your]235-you brothers]246-your brothers in the end . [[Your]235-you father]212-dad parented in the only way [he]53-seth kane knew how , and [I]199-grandpa ’m [the one]247-the one to blame .

Of course [Grandpa]199-grandpa excuses [[my]199-grandpa father]212-dad ’s actions . [Grandpa]199-grandpa was too busy to pay close enough attention to the real monster [[his]199-grandpa son]53-seth kane turned out to be .

As [I]199-grandpa write this , [I]199-grandpa ’m living in [Dreamland]2-dreamland , trying to reconnect with [myself]199-grandpa . Something has been bothering [me]199-grandpa over the last couple of years and it did n’t click until [I]199-grandpa came here to reevaluate [my]199-grandpa life . [I]199-grandpa met [someone who opened [my]199-grandpa eyes to [my]199-grandpa mistakes]248-someone who opened my eyes to my mistakes . As the company grew , [I]199-grandpa lost touch with why [I]199-grandpa started this all . [I]199-grandpa realized that [I]199-grandpa ’ve been surrounded by [so many happy people]249-so many happy people , yet [I]199-grandpa have never felt so alone in [my]199-grandpa life . And although [my]199-grandpa name is synonymous with the word “ happiness , ”[199-grandpa] [I]199-grandpa feel anything but .

An uncomfortable feeling claws at [my]199-grandpa chest , begging to be released . There was a dark time in [my]199-grandpa life when [I]199-grandpa could relate to [his]248-someone who opened my eyes to my mistakes comment . But [I]199-grandpa shut that part of [my]199-grandpa brain off once [I]199-grandpa realized [no one]250-no one could save [me]199-grandpa but [myself]199-grandpa .

[I]199-grandpa shake [my]199-grandpa head and refocus [my]199-grandpa attention .

Growing old is a peculiar thing because it puts everything into perspective . This updated will is [my]199-grandpa way of making amends after [my]199-grandpa death and fixing [my]199-grandpa wrongs before it ’s too late . [I]199-grandpa do n’t want this life for [you]251-your three . Hell , [I]199-grandpa do n’t want it for [[your]251-your father]245-your father either . So [Grandpa]199-grandpa is here to save the day , in true Dreamland prince fashion ( or [villain]253-villain , but that ’s going to depend on [your]251-your perspective , not [mine]199-grandpa ) .

[You]254-you each have been given a task to complete to receive [your]254-you percentage of the company after [my]199-grandpa death . Do [you]254-you expect anything less from [the man who writes fairy tales for a living]255-the man who writes fairy tales for a living ? [I]199-grandpa ca n’t just GIVE [you]254-you the company . So to [you]254-you , [Rowan]296-rowan , the dreamer who stopped dreaming , [I]199-grandpa ask [you]254-you one thing …

[Rowan

[I]199-grandpa sigh . “ Let ’s hope for the best ? ”[199-grandpa]

Maybe it really is kismet .

6

[Zahra]420-zahra

The last week has been hell . It ’s taken all [my]199-grandpa willpower to make it through [my]199-grandpa shifts at [the salon]2134-the salon because [I]199-grandpa ’m tired from worrying . [I]199-grandpa ’ve been waiting for the other shoe to drop because it ’s only a matter of time before [the Creators]389-the creators call [me]199-grandpa out on [my]199-grandpa proposal .
